name: Prismatic Adult Dragon
description: This massive dragon exhibits a breathtaking array of colors and a formidable presence, combining physical strength with a range of magical abilities.
memorable: It can unleash devastating radiant breath weapons and instill fear with its Frightful Presence while being remarkably resistant due to its Legendary Resistance.
goals: The dragon may seek to safeguard its territory, acquire treasure, or engage in combat for amusement.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other dragons or as a protector of magic-rich locales.
environment: Usually found in mountainous areas, ancient ruins, or places of great magic.
strengths: Possesses a variety of powerful breath weapons, high damage output, and significant magical capabilities.
weaknesses: Reliant on spellcasting, making it vulnerable to counter-spells or enemies that can resist its magic.
attacks: Utilizes a mix of bite, claw, and tail attacks, complemented by a fear-inducing aura and powerful breath weapons.
most_powerful_ability: Breath Weapon, dealing heavy damage in a wide area and splitting it among various damage types.
senses: Has blindsight out to 60 feet and a high passive perception of 22, ensuring it is always aware of its surroundings.
skills: Noteworthy perception skill, although it has only a modest bonus.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance makes it hard to overcome its defenses.
Can cast spells at will, offering battlefield control.
Associated with radiant damage immunity and can inflict radiant damage.
Instills fear with its Frightful Presence, affecting multiple creatures.
Can unleash shimmering wings attack causing additional damage and blindness.
spellcasting: Can cast spells at will, including charm person and color spray, and use prismatic spray and prismatic wall multiple times a day.

flying dragon that instills fear and casts spells
